The Coach Parker bag is a fantastic choice, and the monogramming will make it an even more special gift.

**Coach Gift Wrapping:**

Yes, Coach offers gift wrapping services for their products, including the Parker bag. You can choose from a variety of gift wrapping options, including:

* Coach's signature gift box with a satin ribbon and gift card
* A premium gift box with a satin ribbon and gift card
* A personalized gift box with a satin ribbon and gift card, which can be monogrammed with your sister's initials (additional fee applies)

You can select the gift wrapping option during checkout on Coach's website or request it when you visit a Coach store. The gift wrapping service is usually free or available for a small fee (around $5-$10).

**Tips:**

* Make sure to select the gift wrapping option during checkout or request it when you visit a Coach store.
* If you're purchasing online, you can add a personalized gift message to the order, which will be included with the gift.
* Consider adding a Coach gift card to the order, so your sister can treat herself to a future purchase.

I think the gift wrapping will add a lovely touch to the gift, and your sister will appreciate the extra thought and effort you put into making it special.

Now that we've covered the bag, monogramming, and gift wrapping, I think you've got a fantastic gift for your sister! If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask.
